ind:sql57_test.comment: Ensure No Accounts With Default Passwords Exist
Ensure All Sample Data And Users Have Been Removed
Ensure 'AUDIT_SYS_OPERATIONS' Is Set to 'TRUE'
Ensure 'AUDIT_TRAIL' Is Set to OS or DB or DB, EXTENDED or XML or XML, EXTENDED
Ensure 'GLOBAL_NAMES' Is Set to 'TRUE'
Ensure 'O7_DICTIONARY_ACCESSIBILITY' Is Set to 'FALSE'
Ensure 'OS_ROLES' Is Set to 'FALSE'
Ensure 'REMOTE_LISTENER' Is Empty
Ensure 'REMOTE_LOGIN_PASSWORDFILE' Is Set to 'NONE'
Ensure 'REMOTE_OS_AUTHENT' Is Set to 'FALSE'
Ensure 'REMOTE_OS_ROLES' Is Set to 'FALSE'
Ensure 'UTL_FILE_DIR' Is Empty
Ensure 'SEC_CASE_SENSITIVE_LOGON' Is Set to 'TRUE'
Ensure 'SEC_MAX_FAILED_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS' Is Set to '3' or Less
Ensure 'SEC_PROTOCOL_ERROR_FURTHER_ACTION' Is Set to 'DROP,3'
Ensure 'SEC_PROTOCOL_ERROR_TRACE_ACTION' Is Set to 'LOG'
Ensure 'SEC_RETURN_SERVER_RELEASE_BANNER' Is Set to 'FALSE'
Ensure 'SQL92_SECURITY' Is Set to 'TRUE'
Ensure '_TRACE_FILES_PUBLIC' Is Set to 'FALSE'
Ensure 'RESOURCE_LIMIT' Is Set to 'TRUE'
Ensure 'FAILED_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS' Is Not Greater than '5'
Ensure 'PASSWORD_LOCK_TIME' Is Not Less than '1'
Ensure 'PASSWORD_LIFE_TIME' Is Not Greater than '90'
Ensure 'PASSWORD_REUSE_MAX' Is Not Less than '20'
Ensure 'PASSWORD_REUSE_TIME' Is Not Less than '365'
Ensure 'PASSWORD_GRACE_TIME' Is Not Greater than '5'
Ensure 'DBA_USERS.PASSWORD' Is Not Set to 'EXTERNAL' for Any User
Ensure 'PASSWORD_VERIFY_FUNCTION' Is Not 'DEFAULT' or 'NULL'
Ensure 'SESSIONS_PER_USER' Is Not Greater than '10'
Ensure No Users Are Assigned the 'DEFAULT' Profile

ind:sql57_object.ind:sql: SELECT USERNAME FROM DBA_USERS_WITH_DEFPWD WHERE USERNAME NOT LIKE '%XS$NULL%'
